recursive function max_matching(v, p) result(res)

   integer, intent(in) :: v, p

   integer :: res, a, o, w, r

   a = 0

   o = 0

   do i = 1, g(v)%count

      w = g(v)%neighbors(i) if (w == p) cycle

      r = max_matching(w, v)

      a = a + r / 2

      o = o + mod(r, 2)

   end do

   res = 2*a + min(1, o) + 1

end function

   subroutine add_neighbor(node, neighbor)
